data.name: Swordsman VR
data.detailed_description:
The Jötunn wields seemingly infinite power: Hellfire. Journey through medieval Earth to stop him from taking over the world. Defeat him and become the ultimate Swordsman in VR.




Swordsman's physics engine offers a visceral combat experience. Our physics-based approach to weapons, armor, objects and bodies will challenge you and make you feel unstoppable at the same time. We're currently working on the game-changing "Advanced Combat" update.




To save humanity, you'll have to defeat armies from all over the world. Knights, Vikings, Mongols, Samurai, Pirates and more. Epic battles on ships in the Caribbean, duel to the death in the Gobi desert or clash with Hel, the goddess of the Underworld.




Visit the Blacksmith to purchase weapons or take down powerful bosses to unlock their unique weapons and their special abilities. Gear up for increasingly difficult fights on your quest to find the Jötunn. Experience our released "Advanced Weapon Handling" update.




Weapons alone will not be enough to defeat the Jötunn and his armies. Visit the Skill Master to upgrade your stats and skills and the Armorer to equip yourself with better armor. Be strategic and build your ideal character build to suit your unique playstyle.




  • Advanced combat mechanics with intelligent opponents that can engage in real sword-play
  • Seven different thematic combat environments
  • Dismemberment, armor physics, hand-to-hand combat and advanced weapon handling
  • Factions, including: Knights, Vikings, Mongols, Samurai, Pirates and eight different bosses
  • Horde: a zombie survival mode
  • Various weapon types
  • Player progression and RPG elements
  • Dozens of armors, weapons and shields (including powerful boss weapons)
  • Campaign, Arena and Event modes
  • Lots of stats and skills to upgrade for your ideal character build
  • Chronokinesis to slow time down (with a modifier to let you do it whenever you want)
  • Gameplay modifiers to change the core game in fun and exciting ways
  • Participate in real-life events for real-life prizes


Click above and join us on Discord to chat with the developers, get the latest news on Swordsman, and participate in contests and giveaways. Eager to see you there!

data.short_description: Swordsman is a physics-based medieval combat game. Customize your warrior, battle different factions in epic arenas and defeat powerful enemies to unlock their special boss weapons on your journey to save the world from evil.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5-4590 Equivalent or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Equivalent or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains realistic violence and gore. Content is suitable for adults ages 18 and up.
